data.Sentence_cn: 为什么当银行把储户的名字印在支票上时，储户就没有风险了?
data.Sentence: Why is there no risk to the customer when a bank prints the customer's name on his cheques?

data.Sentence_cn: 任何人在银行开一个活期账户，就等于把钱借给了银行。
data.Sentence: When anyone opens a current account at a bank, he is lending the bank money,

data.Sentence_cn: 这笔钱他可以随时提取，提取的方式可以是取现金，也可以是开一张以他人为收款人的支票。
data.Sentence: repayment of which he may demand at any time either in cash or by drawing a cheque in favour of another person.

data.Sentence_cn: 银行与储户的关系主要是债务人和债权人的关系。
data.Sentence: Primarily, the banker-customer relationship is that of debtor and creditor--

data.Sentence_cn: 究竟谁是债务人谁是债权人，要看储户是有结余还是透支。
data.Sentence: who is which depending on whether the customer's account is in credit or is overdrawn.

data.Sentence_cn: 除了这一基本的简单的概念外，
data.Sentence: But, in addition to that basically simple concept,

data.Sentence_cn: 银行和储户彼此还需承担大量义务。
data.Sentence: the bank and its customer owe a large number of obligations to one another.

data.Sentence_cn: 其中许多义务往往引起问题和纠纷。但是储户不能像货物的买主那样。
data.Sentence: Many of these obligations can give rise to problems and complications but a bank customer, unlike, say, a buyer of goods,

data.Sentence_cn: 他们不能抱怨法律对自己不利。
data.Sentence: cannot complain that the law is loaded against him.

data.Sentence_cn: 银行必须遵照储户的嘱托办事，不能听从其他人的指令。
data.Sentence: The bank must obey its customer's instructions, and not those of anyone else.

data.Sentence_cn: 比如，储户首次在银行开户时，嘱咐银行他的存款只能凭本世人签字的支票来提取。
data.Sentence: When, for example, a customer first opens an account, he instructs the bank to debit his account only in respect of cheques drawn by himself.

data.Sentence_cn: 他把自己签名的样本交给银行，对此有一条非常严格的规定：
data.Sentence: He gives the bank specimens of his signature, and there is a very firm rule

data.Sentence_cn: 银行没有任何权利或理由把储户的钱取走，
data.Sentence: that the bank has no right or authority to pay out a customer's money on a cheque
on which its customer's signature has been forged.

data.Sentence_cn: 即使伪造得很巧妙，也不能付款，
data.Sentence: It makes no difference that the forgery may have been a very skillful one:

data.Sentence_cn: 因为银行有责任辨认出其储户的签名。
data.Sentence: the bank must recognize its customer's signature.

data.Sentence_cn: 因此，某些银行已采用把储户印在支票上的作法。这种做法对储户毫无风险。
data.Sentence: For this reason there is no risk to the customer in the practice, adopted by banks, of printing the customer's name on his cheques.

data.Sentence_cn: 如果因这种作法出现了伪造的话，受损失的将不是储户，而是银行。
data.Sentence: If this facilitates forgery, it is the bank which will lose, not the customer.
